tit.j: 京都シティハーフマラソン

sen.j: 京都シティハーフマラソン（きょうとシティハーフマラソン）は、京都府京都市で毎年3月の第2日曜日に行われるハーフマラソン大会。
sen.e: Kyoto City Half Marathon is a half marathon event, which takes place annually on the second Sunday in March, in the city of Kyoto, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kyoto City Half-Marathon is an event that takes place annually on the second Sunday in March, in the city of Kyoto, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kyoto City Half-Marathon is an event that takes place annually on the second Sunday in March, in the city of Kyoto, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 1994年に初開催。
sen.e: The first event was held in 1994.
The first event was held in 1994.
The first event was held in 1994.

sen.j: 京都市と京都陸上競技協会との共催。
sen.e: It was hosted by Kyoto City and Kyoto Track and Field Association.
It was hosted by Kyoto City and the Kyoto Track and Field Association.
It was hosted by Kyoto City and the Kyoto Track and Field Association.

sen.j: 京都市の財政難から2009年3月8日の第16回大会を最後に中止の方針を固めている。
sen.e: Due to financial difficulties, Kyoto City decided to discontinue the tradition after the 16th event on March 8, 2009.
Due to financial difficulties, Kyoto City decided to discontinue the tradition after the 16th event on March 8, 2009.
Due to financial difficulties, Kyoto City decided to discontinue the tradition after the 16th event on March 8, 2009.

sen.j: ハーフマラソン
sen.e: Half marathon
Half-marathon
Half-marathon

sen.j: 車いす競技 (5km)
sen.e: Wheelchair marathon (5km)
Wheelchair marathon (5 km)
Wheelchair marathon (5 km)

sen.j: 2時間15分（第16回大会）
sen.e: 2 hours 15 minutes (the 16th event)
2 hours 15 minutes (the 16th event)
2 hours 15 minutes (the 16th event)

sen.j: 平安神宮前から御池通、烏丸通、今出川通、加茂街道、北山通、川端通を通り北上、国立京都国際会館前で折り返して白川通を南下、丸太町通を通り平安神宮前まで戻るルート。
sen.e: The route starts in front of Heian-jingu Shrine; goes though Oike-dori Street, Karasuma-dori Street, Imadegawa-dori Street, Kamo-kaido Road, and Kitayama-dori Street; goes north along Kawabata-dori Street into a turn around point in front of Kyoto International Conference Center; goes south along Shirakawa-dori Street; and follow Marutamachi-dori Street back to the front of Heian-jingu Shrine.

The route starts in front of Heian-jingu Shrine; proceeds along Oike-dori Street, Karasuma-dori Street, Imadegawa-dori Street, Kamo-kaido Road, and Kitayama-dori Street; goes north along Kawabata-dori Street into a turnaround point in front of the Kyoto International Conference Center; goes south along Shirakawa-dori Street; and follows Marutamachi-dori Street back to the front of Heian-jingu Shrine.

The route starts in front of Heian-jingu Shrine; proceeds along Oike-dori Street, Karasuma-dori Street, Imadegawa-dori Street, Kamo-kaido Road, and Kitayama-dori Street; goes north along Kawabata-dori Street into a turnaround point in front of the Kyoto International Conference Center; goes south along Shirakawa-dori Street; and follows Marutamachi-dori Street back to the front of Heian-jingu Shrine.

sen.j: 但し、車いす競技はスタートから5kmの地点（京都御苑乾御門前）がゴール。
sen.e: On the contrary, the finish line for wheelchair marathon is located at the 5km point (in front of Kyoto Gyoen Inui-gomon gate) from the start.
On the contrary, the finish line for the wheelchair marathon is located at a point 5 km from the start, in front of Kyoto Gyoen Inui-gomon gate.
On the contrary, the finish line for the wheelchair marathon is located at a point 5 km from the start, in front of Kyoto Gyoen Inui-gomon gate.

sen.j: 途中5つの関門が設定されている。
sen.e: There are five checkpoints located along the route.
There are five checkpoints along the route.
There are five checkpoints along the route.

sen.e: The 1st checkpoint: Front of Kyoto Gyoen Inui-gomon gate (5.0km)
The first checkpoint: In front of Kyoto Gyoen Inui-gomon gate (5.0 km)
The first checkpoint: In front of Kyoto Gyoen Inui-gomon gate (5.0 km)

The second checkpoint: The junction of Kamo-kaido Road and Shimei-dori Street (7.6 km)
The second checkpoint: The junction of Kamo-kaido Road and Shimei-dori Street (7.6 km)

The third checkpoint: The junction of Kitayama-dori Street and Shimogamo Hon-dori Street (9.9 km)

sen.e: The 5th checkpoint: Junction at Shirakawa-dori Street and Kitaoji-dori Street (17.3km)
The fifth checkpoint: The junction of Shirakawa-dori Street and Kitaoji-dori Street (17.3 km)

sen.j: 大会当日18歳以上（高校生以下は除く）で、ハーフマラソン(21.0975km)を2時間以内で完走可能な者（車いす競技除く）。
sen.e: Participants must be at least 18 years old (excluding high school and younger students) on the race day, and be able to complete this half marathon (21.0975km) within 2 hours (excluding the wheelchair marathon race).

Participants must be at least 18 years old (excluding students in high school and below) on the day of the race, and must be able to complete this half-marathon (21.0975 km) within two hours (excluding those in the wheelchair marathon race).

Participants must be at least 18 years old (excluding students in high school and below) on the day of the race, and must be able to complete this half-marathon (21.0975 km) within two hours (excluding those in the wheelchair marathon race).
